title: Scallion Salad
directions: Set up a bowl of ice and water. Cut the scallions crosswise into 3-inch pieces, then slice lengthwise into thin matchsticks. Place in the bowl of ice water and soak for at least 20 minutes—the scallions will curl, crisp, and mellow. (If not serving immediately, refrigerate until ready to use, up to 12 hours.)
When ready to serve, whisk together the vinegar, sugar, sesame oil, and chili flakes until the sugar dissolves.
Drain the scallions and pat dry with paper towels. Toss with the dressing and serve.
